predictions.text: Note: these are the guidelines as of March 2019

We may use cookies, clear GIFs, third party web analytics, device information, and IP addresses for functionality and to better understand user interaction with our products, services, and communications
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: Google Analytics, which places a cookie on your device, to obtain metrics on how users engage with our websites.
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: Do Not Track: Mozilla does not track users across third party websites to provide targeted advertising
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: Email: Our marketing communications are optional to receive and you can unsubscribe from the footer of the email or by updating your Mozilla email preferences
predictions.description: You can opt out of promotional communications

predictions.text: Optimizely: Opt-out on www.mozilla.org or visit Optimizely's opt-out website for more information
predictions.description: You can opt out of promotional communications

predictions.text: Yahoo: visit the Ad Interest Manager to opt-out
predictions.description: You can opt out of promotional communications

predictions.text: You can turn on Do Not Track in your browser
predictions.description: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway.

predictions.text: If we remove all personal information from a set of data then the remaining is non-personal information
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: If our organizational structure or status changes (if we undergo a restructuring, are acquired, or go bankrupt) we may pass your information to a successor or affiliate
predictions.description: This service can sell your personal data

predictions.text: We also don't want your personal information for any longer than we need it, so we only keep it long enough to do what we collected it for
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: Once we don't need it, we take steps to destroy it unless we are required by law to keep it longer
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: We're a global organization and our computers are in several different places around the world
predictions.description: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

predictions.text: We also use service providers whose computers may also be in various countries
predictions.description: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

predictions.text: If you are under 13, we don't want your personal information, and you must not provide it to us
predictions.description: Only available to users of a certain age

predictions.text: If the changes are substantive, we will announce the update through Mozilla's usual channels for such announcements such as blog posts and forums
predictions.description: Users will be notified when terms are changed
